function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardized framework for IoT device implementation","Impact":"Increased cost, maintenance, and security concerns","Mitigation":"Developing a standardized framework for IoT device implementation","Technologies":"IoT standards and protocols","People":"Urban managers, city officials","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Monopolistic introduction of unique IoT devices by corporations","Impact":"Complexity in installation, monitoring, and maintenance of devices","Mitigation":"Encouraging the use of standardized devices and protocols","Technologies":"IoT standards and protocols","People":"Urban managers, city officials","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Expensive infrastructure investment due to multiple device platforms","Impact":"High infrastructure investment, slow adoption of Smart City concept","Mitigation":"Creating a holistic device platform, encouraging the use of standardized devices and protocols","Technologies":"IoT standards and protocols","People":"Urban managers, city officials","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners"}]}
